info.description: This API allows interaction with Anytype resources such as spaces, objects, and object types.
info.title: Anytype API

post.summary: Open a modal window with a code in Anytype Desktop app

get.summary: Retrieve an authentication token using a code

parameters.description: The code retrieved from Anytype Desktop app
parameters.name: code

get.summary: Search and retrieve objects across all the spaces

parameters.description: The search term to filter objects by name
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: The number of items to return
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: The number of items to return
parameters.name: limit

get.summary: Retrieve a list of members for the specified Space

parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: The number of items to return
parameters.name: limit

get.summary: Retrieve object types in a specific space

parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: The number of items to return
parameters.name: limit

get.summary: Retrieve a list of templates for a specific object type in a space

parameters.description: The ID of the object type
parameters.name: typeId

parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: The number of items to return
parameters.name: limit

get.summary: Retrieve objects in a specific space

parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: The number of items to return
parameters.name: limit

post.summary: Create a new object in a specific space

get.summary: Retrieve a specific object in a space

put.summary: Update an existing object in a specific space

parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: The number of items to return
parameters.name: limit

reply_to_message_id.description: Identifier for the message being replied to

marks.description: List of marks applied to the text

style.description: The style/type of the message part

text.description: The text content of the message part

has_more.description: whether there are more items available

total.description: the total number of items available on that endpoint

reactions.description: Map of emoji to list of user IDs
